price: 170. Dan orang-orang yang berpegang teguh pada Kitab (Taurat) serta melaksanakan salat, (akan diberi pahala). Sungguh, Kami tidak akan menghilangkan pahala orang-orang salih.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ يُمَسِّكُونَ بِٱلۡكِتَٰبِ وَأَقَامُواْ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ إِنَّا لَا نُضِيعُ أَجۡرَ ٱلۡمُصۡلِحِينَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna yumassikūna bil-kitābi wa-aqāmū al-ṣalata innā lā nuḍīʿu ajra al-muṣ'liḥīna
